text: Alternative ribosome-rescue factor A (ArfA, YhdL) also known as peptidyl-tRNA hydrolase, is a protein that plays a role in rescuing of stalled ribosomes. ==See also== * ArfB - Alternative ribosome-rescue factor B * arfB the gene for ArfA. ==References== ==External links== Category:Proteins
title: Alternative ribosome-rescue factor A
